newsitem.title: DENMARK: EAC sells tanker to Marpetrol-paper.
newsitem.headline: EAC sells tanker to Marpetrol-paper.

text.p: Danish shipping group East Asiatic Company (EAC) has resold to Spain's Marpetrol SA a product tanker it bought from Ukrainian shipbuilder Kherson last month, Danish shipping journal Soefart reported on Friday.
"The sales price is reported as $27.5 million, which should give EAC a good profit on the basis of the delivery price from the Kherson yard of $26.5 million," the paper said.
EAC was not immediately available for comment on the report.
The newspaper said the resale of the 29,000 DWT Nord Asiatic Sea was planned in advance as part of a joint project with D/S Norden under which the partners ordered three vessels from Kherson.

The next of the three will be delivered to Norden and the third is to be jointly owned by Norden and EAC but Soefart said that negotiations for Norden to buy its partner's half-share were nearing completion. --Stig Pedersen, Copenhagen newsroom +45 33969659
